project_blurb: You might be familiar with the tired old adage: "You can't judge a book by its cover." Well Gavel is an android app that aims to turn that notion on its head. With Gavel, a user can capture an image of the cover of any book, and Gavel will [via RIS] identify key information about that book, such as the the Title, Author, and ISBN. Using this information, Gavel polls a variety of sources to gather data on pricing, as well as multiple sets of reviews (where possible). All of this data is collated and presented to the user in a beautiful format, truly allowing them to "judge" books without ever turning a page.
